name: Flappy Bird +
description:
Disclaimer: I do NOT own any assets used here. .Gears owns them. This is an UNOFFICIAL PORT! Profit from this is PROHIBITED!

Flappy Bird is back, better than ever! Here are some things that will make you stay!

- The new "+ Mode" has fast paced Flappy action! It can slow down, speed up, or go backwards! With a new background, this mode keeps you on your toes!

- Like the classics? Try "Classic Mode", it keeps things just they way they were.

- With 7 medals to earn, the possibilities are endless!

What are you waiting for? Download now!
